text: (nabiye!) ovunge vastunda ovunge janatavada, (vÃ¦di vi tibima) obava mavitayata pat nokeretva! allah (eva ovunta laba di) eva magin ovunva melova jivitayema danduvam kirimata niyata vasayenma adahas karanneya. tavada ovun pratiksepa karannan vasayen sitiyadi ovunge pana yamada (adahas karanneya)
